duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform accounting activities in compliance with financial, regulatory, and INVISTA accounting policies and guidelines.
Perform systematic closing responsibilities and coordinating workflow streams across our global accounting organization.
Responsible for global financial reporting balance sheet and income statement accuracy and analysis.
Participate in annual financial audits and government reporting.
Problem solve accounting and reporting issues.
Communicate effectively across the global organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Accounting, Finance or Economics.
1+ years of experience in a finance or accounting role.
